## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


## Accessing the API
```{r}
query_function <- function(subject, set.name, pokemon.name, sort.by) {
  data_url = paste0("https://api.pokemontcg.io/v2/", subject, "?q=set.name:", set.name,"%20name:", pokemon.name, "&orderBy:", sort.by)
info <- httr::GET(url=data_url)
parsed = jsonlite::fromJSON(rawToChar(info$content))
queried_data = as.tibble(parsed$data)
return(queried_data)
}
```


# Example using the function
This will return all Mew cards from the TCG set "Celebrations" sorted by number
```{r}
query_function("cards", "celebrations","mew","number")
```
